commit.message:
lint: Run the linters against Mac OS on Travis

This helps ensure ongoing compatibility with macOS-distributed version
of GNU bash.

verification.signature:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Comment: GPGTools - https://gpgtools.org

iQEcBAABCgAGBQJdnfOSAAoJEG7l83hfeLNFggIIAIuQYvDZ7VwAnK1DZKKI2oGs
pj2r89zrEF08Syzq+eWf+n49AApd8wO3tBVD/s9vmBKw4VJ7RElv4NX1fawOOObO
tvvTtKJHKDcZ0es3l2Yv1EBx01cDObDTP/K4pOKiQQ8nwZduaIJ3wjjT1rqJVV5e
HFWrn9YKBqDzc+8IBC4wYm8IkXGuR8Ut/RHFm2s+yXpaMdD9aoOc++C5Xc8EyRne
6Yz/cBbltE3Hpu55mCqRgIF0IXFAFwiAnW6hI65+ljbMAwSTuTvggAOiJHz7rzKS
qV2lrtRgu3TVlRZm6rbpz6zEjOkS9xXColS7eD+5D3hTlxEiRG2bUnxGIfEsLxA=
=mQg0
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
verification.payload:
tree 02c1135dfd2c45c1d9f04ef67f49f48e34e10ac7
parent c08bf2b574636023cd9d68cb43b3dada5b0cc737
author Ben Woosley <ben.woosley@gmail.com> 1560540042 -0400
committer Ben Woosley <ben.woosley@gmail.com> 1570632591 +0100

lint: Run the linters against Mac OS on Travis

This helps ensure ongoing compatibility with macOS-distributed version
of GNU bash.

files.patch:
@@ -88,6 +88,28 @@ jobs:
       script:
         - set -o errexit; source ./ci/extended_lint/06_script.sh
 
+    - stage: extended-lint
+      name: 'lint macOS 10.12 (compat)'
+      os: osx
+      # Use the earliest macOS that can build our lint dependencies:
+      # Xcode 8.3.3, macOS 10.12, JDK 1.8.0_112-b16
+      # https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/reference/osx/#OS-X-Version
+      osx_image: xcode8.3
+      # TODO: if you're updating osx_image, try using "rvm:" to supply the
+      # version of ruby required by homebrew. Despite this "rvm:" declaration,
+      # brew update installs ruby 2.3.7 as its first action.
+      language: ruby
+      rvm:
+        - 2.3.7
+      env:
+      cache: false
+      install:
+        - set -o errexit; source ./ci/lint/04_install.sh
+      before_script:
+        - set -o errexit; source ./ci/lint/05_before_script.sh
+      script:
+        - set -o errexit; source ./ci/lint/06_script.sh
+
     - stage: test
       name: 'ARM  [GOAL: install]  [no unit or functional tests]'
       env: >-

@@ -6,9 +6,17 @@
 
 export LC_ALL=C
 
+if [ "$TRAVIS_OS_NAME" == "osx" ]; then
+  # update first to install required ruby dependency
+  travis_retry brew update
+  travis_retry brew install shellcheck
+  travis_retry brew upgrade python
+  export PATH="$(brew --prefix python)/bin:$PATH"
+else
+  SHELLCHECK_VERSION=v0.6.0
+  travis_retry curl --silent "https://storage.googleapis.com/shellcheck/shellcheck-${SHELLCHECK_VERSION}.linux.x86_64.tar.xz" | tar --xz -xf - --directory /tmp/
+  export PATH="/tmp/shellcheck-${SHELLCHECK_VERSION}:${PATH}"
+fi
+
 travis_retry pip3 install codespell==1.15.0
 travis_retry pip3 install flake8==3.7.8
-
-SHELLCHECK_VERSION=v0.6.0
-curl -s "https://storage.googleapis.com/shellcheck/shellcheck-${SHELLCHECK_VERSION}.linux.x86_64.tar.xz" | tar --xz -xf - --directory /tmp/
-export PATH="/tmp/shellcheck-${SHELLCHECK_VERSION}:${PATH}"

commit.message:
lint: Fix shellcheck SC2155

Declare and assign separately to avoid masking return values.

https://github.com/koalaman/shellcheck/wiki/SC2155

verification.signature:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Comment: GPGTools - https://gpgtools.org

iQEcBAABCgAGBQJdnfPCAAoJEG7l83hfeLNFOccH/jqjoWwUrkajwUXiLnyNww6/
ndQOV/vzNZa0pLNtQj5UrkfpH1MiRGj+MWPxK6P2LZ8t6zZKsgmeg55hapnVBEN1
hAFy5mRez1/yj0DIBw/ahHfrqMPh8gn2dzFeaZRB/YDK98NmiWrlelCs+1xGlKmV
9SFuYC/Zrp4lkwelvcCN50p3WFJ94BwARPDEk6rlotJI0hHVY9ycij0ol8ICAt3s
CjYFgSa+gu2ALO8T3Wmp29Tg/6Q3lXA+yeeJX2EavWH7LsiRg6zCmmebbd3AWT1G
a2qadLpw0HssPluBe1m7TFO0bx9CcmpAiXrwupDgT4dBSs8Yw9s00P1eXlAiP5Q=
=Y/oh
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
verification.payload:
tree a8d201bd1bfd03439c664aa0c0896880bb0e64cf
parent 615ff4e7dbe2c4fc888ef489cf71dbca25d1b568
author Ben Woosley <ben.woosley@gmail.com> 1560098050 +0200
committer Ben Woosley <ben.woosley@gmail.com> 1570632642 +0100

lint: Fix shellcheck SC2155

Declare and assign separately to avoid masking return values.

https://github.com/koalaman/shellcheck/wiki/SC2155

files.patch:
@@ -11,11 +11,13 @@ if [ "$TRAVIS_OS_NAME" == "osx" ]; then
   travis_retry brew update
   travis_retry brew install shellcheck
   travis_retry brew upgrade python
-  export PATH="$(brew --prefix python)/bin:$PATH"
+  PATH="$(brew --prefix python)/bin:$PATH"
+  export PATH
 else
   SHELLCHECK_VERSION=v0.6.0
   travis_retry curl --silent "https://storage.googleapis.com/shellcheck/shellcheck-${SHELLCHECK_VERSION}.linux.x86_64.tar.xz" | tar --xz -xf - --directory /tmp/
-  export PATH="/tmp/shellcheck-${SHELLCHECK_VERSION}:${PATH}"
+  PATH="/tmp/shellcheck-${SHELLCHECK_VERSION}:${PATH}"
+  export PATH
 fi
 
 travis_retry pip3 install codespell==1.15.0

commit.message:
lint: Install grep and git via brew on mac for --perl-regexp

Particularly `--with-pcre2` is needed to run `git grep --perl-regexp` in
`test/link/check-doc.py`

verification.signature:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Comment: GPGTools - https://gpgtools.org

iQEcBAABCgAGBQJdnfPCAAoJEG7l83hfeLNFed8IAJwDzRAN59ysC58n6ipbbQIt
Ry4QRky9Ke9DeSrXBkcCEq88ThsuHOjCKAnN77QHlNxdnRB4uyxe1sKEZLJYLnOK
sxXT8NxddOtEmdjB5KjrXQUkkaW69vPBJEtugw1JX4nrwcHsDw8EePt60jKnAisN
n7FZFOoWx474MFXgK/xDkbaEt2Q4/QkxWs1Vy+oGtqpFw1Xv5A3aGgpB4H1QJ4eX
U2gBMxbSQXD1hktmokT3u1pOyxidte3YmZ4WE15N+dMt0lg68hHku1fRsG/jCsAS
1FAcs4Cpp0dmsTb5zGsKkcN7Zj/rvAClLgYISze1y48LDMz9aodbdPoFSySqoWc=

verification.payload:
tree c069a9aad020cb5bf7b1c61bf8a9fa348cb19c0b
parent eafa747ca5926d47f555820cecae0846ac01e20f
author Ben Woosley <ben.woosley@gmail.com> 1560135347 +0200
committer Ben Woosley <ben.woosley@gmail.com> 1570632642 +0100

lint: Install grep and git via brew on mac for --perl-regexp

Particularly `--with-pcre2` is needed to run `git grep --perl-regexp` in
`test/link/check-doc.py`

files.patch:
@@ -9,6 +9,9 @@ export LC_ALL=C
 if [ "$TRAVIS_OS_NAME" == "osx" ]; then
   # update first to install required ruby dependency
   travis_retry brew update
+  travis_retry brew reinstall git -- --with-pcre2 # for  --perl-regexp
+  travis_retry brew install grep # gnu grep for --perl-regexp support
+  PATH="$(brew --prefix grep)/libexec/gnubin:$PATH"
   travis_retry brew install shellcheck
   travis_retry brew upgrade python
   PATH="$(brew --prefix python)/bin:$PATH"
